analyzed: ci yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam /

analyzed: ji ste dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs na ni chad par lta bar 'gyur te de yang mi rigs so //

original: gal te don du lta na don ni brjod du ma mchis shing bsnyad du ma mchis pa ste de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste

analyzed: / rnam pa de lta bu gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o //

analyzed: ji ste tshig 'brur lta na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no //

original: zhes gsungs pas /

analyzed: de bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mang du @423b thos pa ni rton pa ma lags so //

analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //

analyzed: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /

translated: and that cannot be satisfied by words.

translated: It must be asked of the Tathāgata, the lord of the Dharma.”🔽Then the girl Vimaladattā said to Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta,

analyzed: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //

analyzed: par bgyi ba ma lags shing gnyis su ma mchis la kun du 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //

analyzed: ji ste ngo bo nyid zab pas zab na ni ngo bo nyid gang yang sus kyang brtag par mi nus so //

analyzed: bu mo / 'di ji ltar gzhan dag la bstan par bya /

analyzed: 'jam dpal / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te /

analyzed: de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so //

analyzed: khye'u 'am / bu mo gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de @424b dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de /

translated: If the Tathāgata were to show himself in the body of the Dharma, the body of the Dharma cannot be shown.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gi smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva Ratnaketu said:

analyzed: mthong ba don yod /
translated: “Amogha darśana,

analyzed: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
translated: answer the question of the girl.”
